lst.name: sentence
lst.str: It said its Smith Kline and French Laboratories pharmaceuticals unit, with 1986 sales of 1.9 billion dlrs, will file for Food and Drug Administration marketing approval for a number of cardiovascular agents, including tissue plasminogen activator, over the next two years.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: SmithKline Beckman Corp said it is pursuing a three-point stragey that will achieve a 10 pct annual increase in operating earnings throughout the remainder of the decade.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: To bolster its position in the antiulcer market, in which Tagamet has met stiff competition, SmithKline said its strategy to develop an over-the-counter version of Tagamet is bolstered by two joint ventures, one with <Wellcome PLC>, and one pending venture in Japan.
